messages.subject: Results of the 2007 Samurai Fiction Contest
messages.msgSnippet: Here are the results of the third annual Samurai Fiction contest.  The link to all of the stories, with genres and authors listed can be found here:
messages.messageBody:
Here are the results of the third annual Samurai Fiction contest. The
link to all of the stories, with genres and authors listed can be
found here: http://forums.samurai-archives.com/viewtopic.php?t=1793

Congratulations to all of the winners, and in general, the high
quality of all of the entries this year. I hope to have the stories on
the samurai archives site by the end of next week.

---------------

Best Ending:

Intruder

Best Writing:

The Matsudaira Plot

Most Original:

Magni Nominis Umbra

Best Dialogue:

The Snow-Light Warrior

---------------

Third Place:

The Matsudaira Plot

Second Place:

Magni Nominis Umbra

First Place:

Intruder
